column5: The tank will follow the road to the south.&Team two, take the trail to the base!

column5: Anti-tank gunnery sighted on the north bank.&Pushing ahead could prove dangerous.
column6: Canon Anti-char apercu sur la rive nord.&Continuer d'avancer pourrait s'av<rer dangereux.

column5: We'll have to hope team two can take it out from behind.
column6: Nous devons esp<rer que l'<quipe&deux puisse le descendre par derri>re.

column5: Anti-tank gunnery reported on the north bank.&We're in danger while it remains, Welks.

column5: I got here as soon as I could, but...&Apparently not soon enough.

column5: General Jaeger!&You've brought reinforcements?

column5: Listen. I want you all to pack up what&you can and get ready to evacuate.

column5: What will you do, General?

column5: Buy you boys some time.&Just leave the enemy to me.
column6: Vous faire gagner du temps.&Laisser moi juste m'occuper de l'ennemi.

column5: Heh, not bad, not bad.&Looks like Gallia's got some competent tank men.
column6: H<, pas mal, pas mal.&On dirait que Gallia a quelques tankistes comp<tents.

column5: General Jaeger, the base patrol has finished&evacuating along with the supplies.

column5: All right.&That means this base is just another patch of woods now.

column5: We'll thank the Gallians for this another day.&Get the last of your men out.

column5: Welks, the enemy is abandoning the base.

column5: One step ahead... They timed that perfectly.&I'm just glad that backup unit arrived late.

column5: That should just about do it.

column5: The relay from base patrol says they&barely got out with the supplies.
column6: Le relais de la patrouille de base dit&qu'ils viennent = peine de partir avec les fournitures.

column5: Good. But I've got to hand it to them.&Gallia sent a real fox into these woods.
column6: Bon. Mais je dois leur accorder cela.&Gallia a envoy< un v<ritable renard dans ces bois.

column5: Well, it's not a supply base anymore if there&are no supplies. We're all done here.

column5: Still, we've completed our mission!&Nice work out there, 7's!

column5: &            About Team Attacks& &Sometimes when units near allies attack,&those allies will join in with supporting&fire.&Up to three units can team up, and&their support fire comes at no CP cost.& &The units in your squad each have specific&other members they like especially well.& &Teaming up with those units will result in&an exceptionally powerful attack.&&Staging a team attack against crouching&enemies can be a smart way to defeat them.& &However, bunching up for team attacks&can leave your soldiers open to powerful&area attacks from grenades and mortars.&Know when to group up for offense and&when to stay spread out for defense.& ¢ &              About Evasion& &When being attacked, units will sometimes&duck under enemy fire and avoid damage.& &This is called "evasion" and can be&negated by attacking from the target's&rear.&Attacks from behind also cause the&target to panic, leading to slightly lower&accuracy during their counterattack.&This is yet another reason to always&guard your own back while actively&trying to circle around your foes.
column6: & A propos de l'attaque en <quipe& &Parfois, quand une unit< alli< proche&attaque, les alli<s se joindront en&appui feu.&Jusqu'= trois unit<s peuvent s'associer,&et leur tir de soutien ne coute pas de CP&Les unit<s de votre escouade ont chacun&d'autres membres sp<cifiques qu'ils&aiment particuli>rement bien.&Faire <quipe avec ces unit<s se traduira&par une attaque d'une puissance&exceptionnelle.&Mettre en place une attaque en <quipe&contre les ennemis accroupis peut $tre&une facon intelligente de les vaincre.&Cependant, se rassembler pour des&attaques en <quipe peut laisser vos&soldats expos<s = de puissantes attaques&de zone par grenades ou mortiers.&Sachez voir quand grouper pour attaquer&et quand rester <tal< d<fensivement.

column5: &              About Evasion& &When being attacked, units will sometimes&duck under enemy fire and avoid damage.& &This is called "evasion" and can be&negated by attacking from the target's&rear.&Attacks from behind also cause the&target to panic, leading to slightly lower&accuracy during their counterattack.&This is yet another reason to always&guard your own back while actively&trying to circle around your foes.
column6: &   A propos de l'Evasion& &Lorsque vous $tre attaqu<, les unit<s&vont parfois esquiver le feu ennemi&et <viter les d<gats.&C'est ce qu'on appelle £l'<vasion£ et&peut $tre annul< en attaquant par&l'arri>re de la cible.&Les attaques par derri>re peuvent aussi&causer la panique chez la cible,&conduisant = une pr<cision l<g>rement&inf<rieur au cours de leur contre-attaque&C'est encore une autre raison pour garder&toujours votre propre arri>re tout en&essayant de contourner vos ennemis.
